description: We Are Here to Help Telemedicine visits can be scheduled starting today and already scheduled appointments can be switched to HIPAA secure telemedicine visits. We are offering clinic visits, occasional house calls for established patients, and we are able to see you in our
cleaned_text: We Are Here to Help Telemedicine visits can be scheduled starting today and already scheduled appointments can be switched to HIPAA secure telemedicine visits. We are offering clinic visits, occasional house calls for established patients, and we are able to see you in our outdoor med tent clinic in the courtyard if needed. Acutely ill patients will not be permitted into the clinic, but instead will be cared for in the courtyard, making our clinic safe for all other patients while ensuring everyone has access to safe, effective and clinically indicated care. HOURS & LOCATIONS PORTLAND |Monday - Thursday||9:00 - 6:30| |Friday||9:00 - 5:00| 4246 SE Belmont St, Ste 5 OR 97215 CASCADE LOCKS
